sentence: Vance in Ohio and Doug Mastriano in Pennsylvania, but the intra-party conflicts sparked by Trump's endorsements of unpopular loyalists has made GOP heavyweights more willing to challenge the twice-impeached former president, reported Politico.
author: Travis Gettys
title: Republicans talk trash about Trump as endorsements flop

sentence: In Pennsylvania, gubernatorial candidate Doug Mastrianoone of the ex-presidents biggest election-denial supporterssaw his victory as completely legit.
author: Bess Levin
title: The GOPs New Election Rule: Voter Fraud Is Only Real When We Lose to Democrats
